TopicTitle: bug:Cant exit out of certain areas and go back to menu.

Articles.Content:
this video describes some of it but you will see I cant go into the VAB or the space plane hanger also when I get into something like the research building I cant get out and I cant exit to menu.It happens even if I restart the game and I say I have a mod installed because I do but is incompatible with ksp .90 but I never had any issues with it for about when .90 came out so I dont think thats the problem.The mod is deadly reentry.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HnIAZYGBJ0g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

please anyone I cant play ksp until I get this fixed ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) also please ask for more information if you need any

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-21T20:57:52Z" title="04/21/2015 08:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 21, 2015</time> by FlamingOnion\_1**

Hello, perhaps with the logs you will have more help ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Please read this [How To Get Support](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229).

(And [Deadly Reentry](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54954) is compatible with KSP 0.90 ...)

I do know that deadly reentry is compatible now with .90 just im to lazy to upgrade to that version ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) you should see the log in a second
